New Records: Nicholas Pooran surpassed Chris Gayle to become the leading six-hitter for West Indies in T20Is
Key Match Events: Obed McCoy took 3 wickets for 14 runs
Rashid Khan conceded 36 runs in an over, a world record
Pre-Game Insights: No specific pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Nicholas Pooran acknowledged the crowd after his innings
West Indies finished the group stage with a perfect record and head into the Super Eight stage with a clean slate
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Gros Islet, and the pitch was described as a 'belter' for batting
West Indies scored their highest total in a men's T20 World Cup match
Afghanistan's middle order struggled, averaging 19.71 in the tournament
Others: Rashid Khan made his first appearance in the powerplay for Afghanistan in the T20 World Cup
Mujeeb Ur Rahman was out injured for Afghanistan
Romario Shepherd was absent for the birth of his second child
